definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
variant of 視|视[shi4]/variant of 示[shi4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Remember the terrible accident that opened each episode of the old television show?
sentences.chinese: 想起旧电视节目上展开每段情节的可怕事件了吗？

sentences.english: Reception of TV programmes is unsatisfactory here.
sentences.chinese: 这里电视节目的接收情况不佳。

sentences.english: The first television broadcasts began in 1936.
sentences.chinese: BBC在1936年播出了第一个电视节目。

sentences.english: There’s nothing good on TV tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚没什么好看的电视节目。

sentences.english: I watch TV with subtitles and the volume cranked up.
sentences.chinese: 我看的是带字幕的电视节目，音量调得很大。

sentences.english: Johnny Chan is the planner and presenter of a TV program which covers a diverse range of topics.
sentences.chinese: 陈奕文先生是一档电视节目的筹办者和主持人。

sentences.english: Teachers can also make good use of television programmes.
sentences.chinese: 另外，电视节目也是一个让老师“借力”的好地方。

sentences.english: Smart TV mobile phone, analog TV, can record TV shows.
sentences.chinese: 智能TV手机，模拟电视，可录制电视节目。

sentences.english: Parents must, there- fore, keep an eye on what their children watch.
sentences.chinese: 因此，父母们应该留意孩子所看的电视节目。

sentences.english: The pair appeared together in a television show.
sentences.chinese: 他两人一起参加了一个电视节目。

sentences.english: The show then cut away to the weatherman。
sentences.chinese: 于是电视节目被切成了天气预报。

sentences.english: It looks like reality TV shows are here to stay.
sentences.chinese: 看来真人真事的电视节目已成为风潮。

sentences.english: She had roles in several movies and television programs.
sentences.chinese: 她在几部电影和电视节目中的角色。

sentences.english: So what is your favorite TV program?
sentences.chinese: 那么你最喜欢的电视节目是什么？

sentences.english: She came on the show to plug her latest album.
sentences.chinese: 她出现在电视节目上，推广她的新唱片专辑。

sentences.english: These days the 11th National Games are the hottest TV shows.
sentences.chinese: 这些天11届全运会是最热门的电视节目了。

definition: China Central Television (CCTV), abbr. for 中國中央電視台|中国中央电视台[Zhong1 guo2 Zhong1 yang1 Dian4 shi4 tai2]
China Central Television (CCTV), PRC state TV network
